0.0.0.title: PDC Public Declaration
items: I am submitting in my own name, not in someone else’s name. If I’ve named an affiliated organization, I was affiliated with that organization when I made the finding I‛ve described.

I took part in the investigation that resulted in the finding. As far as I know, I was the first to make the finding, or part of the first group to do so. If I was part of a group, I have written permission from all my colleagues to contribute our finding to the public domain.
I commit to exercise the legal rights and discretion that I have, as an individual, to ensure the contribution of the finding to the public domain.

I commit to publish a warning if I ever become aware of any patent, patent application, or other exclusive claim that might limit who can legally use the finding, or how, as long as I can legally do so.
